remarks: Syllogism inference combined with modus ponens.  (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)  (Revised by Alan Sare, 23-Dec-2016.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
eelT1.1 $e |- ( T. -> ph ) $.
eelT1.2 $e |- ( ps -> ch ) $.
eelT1.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ch ) -> th ) $.
eelT1 $p |- ( ps -> th ) $.
